name: Solitaire 2G Pro
description:
No advertisement version!

Themes : Classic and Christmas!

This solitaire game is a little different from the classic solitaire, no need to rack your brain, enjoy it and you'll to love it.

* How to Play *

Tap or drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors.
Move cards up to the foundation to sort all of the suits from Ace to King.
You can draw one card at a time for a more relaxing game, or draw three for a challenge to train your brain!

* Features *

- Leaderboards for world ranking
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Both Landscape and Portrait orientation support for iPad
- Auto complete
- Statistics
- Winning Streak Record
- Add 30+ patterns of poker backside
- Add 2 patterns of poker face
- sync Game Center data among devices
